title: Strategies for Enhancing Learning Engagement and Performance in Hybrid Lecture Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Core concepts in the major field and professional practice experience
context.additional_context: A simulation-based hybrid learning environment for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Requires customized pedagogical approaches considering interaction differences based on participants' physical/remote contexts.

learning_goals: In hybrid environments, learners conduct three or more professional problem-solving activities using synchronous collaboration tools (e.g., VR simulations, real-time chat).
Learners comparatively analyze two or more interaction strategies in physical/remote classroom settings and propose optimal engagement approaches.
In summative assessments, learners meet criteria for conceptual understanding (70% or higher) and affective engagement (80% or higher).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
